APIView

TtaOpenMainView 
 public static native int TtaOpenMainView(int document,
                                          int x,
                                          int y,
                                          int w,
                                          int h)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaOpenMainView Opens the main view of a document. This document must have a PSchema (see TtaSetPSchema). Parameters: document: the document for which a window must be open. x, y: coordinate (in millimeters) of the upper left corner of the window that will display the view. w, h: width and height (in millimeters) of the upper left corner of the window that will display the view. Return value: the view opened or 0 if the view cannot be opened. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetViewGeometry 
 public static native void TtaGetViewGeometry(int document,
                                              String name,
                                              IntPtr x,
                                              IntPtr y,
                                              IntPtr width,
                                              IntPtr height)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetViewGeometry returns the position (x, y) and sizes (width, height) of the frame wher view is displayed. Parameters: document: the document. name: the name of the view in P schema. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaOpenView 
 public static native int TtaOpenView(int document,
                                      String viewName,
                                      int x,
                                      int y,
                                      int w,
                                      int h)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaOpenView Opens a view for a document. This document must have a PSchema (see TtaSetPSchema). Parameters: document: the document. viewName: name of the view to be opened. x, y: coordinate (in millimeters) of the upper left corner of the window that will display the view. w, h: width and height (in millimeters) of the upper left corner of the window that will display the view. Return value: the view opened or 0 if the view cannot be opened. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaOpenSubView 
 public static native int TtaOpenSubView(int document,
                                         String viewName,
                                         int x,
                                         int y,
                                         int w,
                                         int h,
                                         long subtree)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaOpenSubView Opens a view that shows only a subtree. This document must have a PSchema (see TtaSetPSchema). Parameters: document: the document. viewName: name of the view to be opened. x, y: coordinate (in millimeters) of the upper left corner of the window that will display the view. w, h: width and height (in millimeters) of the upper left corner of the window that will display the view. subtree: root element of the subtree to be shown in the view. Return value: the view opened or 0 if the view cannot be opened. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaChangeViewTitle 
 public static native void TtaChangeViewTitle(int document,
                                              int view,
                                              String title)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaChangeViewTitle Changes the title of a view. Parameters: document: the document. view: the view. title: the new title. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaCloseView 
 public static native void TtaCloseView(int document,
                                        int view)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaCloseView Closes a view. Parameters: document: the document for which a view must be closed. view: the view to be closed. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaFreeView 
 public static native void TtaFreeView(int document,
                                       int view)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaFreeView frees the view of the document. The window continues to exist but the document is no longer displayed in this window. Parameters: document: the document for which a view must be closed. view: the view to be closed. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaSetSensibility 
 public static native void TtaSetSensibility(int document,
                                             int view,
                                             int value)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaSetSensibility Changes the current sensibility used to display a given view of a given document. Parameters: document: the document. Cannot be 0. view: the view. value: new value of the sensibility. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaSetZoom 
 public static native void TtaSetZoom(int document,
                                      int view,
                                      int value)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaSetZoom Changes the current zoom used to display a given view of a given document. Parameters: document: the document. Cannot be 0. view: the view. value: new value of the zoom. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaShowElement 
 public static native void TtaShowElement(int document,
                                          int view,
                                          long element,
                                          int position)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaShowElement Shows a given element in a given view of a given document. Parameters: document: the document to which the element to be shown belongs. Cannot be 0. view: the view where the element must be shown. element: the element to be shown. position: position of the top of the element in the window. Supposing that the y axis is oriented from the top of the window (coordinate 0) to the bottom (coordinate 100, whatever the actual height of the window), position is the desired y coordinate of the top of the element. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetSensibility 
 public static native int TtaGetSensibility(int document,
                                            int view)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetSensibility Reads the current sensibility used to display a given view of a given document. Parameters: document: the document. Cannot be 0. view: the view. Return value: current value of the sensibility. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetZoom 
 public static native int TtaGetZoom(int document,
                                     int view)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetZoom Reads the current zoom used to display a given view of a given document. Parameters: document: the document. Cannot be 0. view: the view. Return value: current value of the zoom. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaIsPSchemaValid 
 public static native int TtaIsPSchemaValid(String structureName,
                                            String presentationName)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaIsPSchemaValid Checks if a presentation schema can be applied to a document of a given class. No document is needed and the schemas are not loaded by this function. Parameters: structureName: Name of the document class. presentationName: Name of the presentation schema to be checked. Return value: 1 if the presentation schema can be applied, 0 if it can not. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGiveViewsToOpen 
 public static native void TtaGiveViewsToOpen(int document,
                                              StringBuffer buffer,
                                              IntPtr nbViews)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGiveViewsToOpen Returns the names of the views that can be opened for a document. Parameters: document: the document. buffer: a buffer that will contain the result. Return parameters: buffer: list of view names. Each name is a character string with a final '\0'. Names of views that are already open have a '*' at the end. nbViews: number of names in the list, 0 if not any view can be open. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetViewName 
 public static native String TtaGetViewName(int document,
                                            int view)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetViewName Returns the name of an open view. Parameters: document: the document to which the view belongs. view: the view. Return value: Name of the view. The buffer must be provided by the caller. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaIsViewOpened 
 public static native boolean TtaIsViewOpened(int document,
                                              int view)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaIsViewOpened Returns TRUE for a open view. Parameters: document: the document to which the view belongs. view: the view. Return value: TRUE or FALSE. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetViewFromName 
 public static native int TtaGetViewFromName(int document,
                                             String viewName)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetViewFromName Returns the identifier of a view of a given document from its name. Parameters: document: the document to which the view belongs. viewName: the name of the view. Return value: the view. 0 if no view of that name is currently open for the document. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaRaiseView 
 public static native void TtaRaiseView(int document,
                                        int view)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- Map and raise the corresponding window. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaSetDisplayMode 
 public static native void TtaSetDisplayMode(int document,
                                             int newDisplayMode)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaSetDisplayMode Changes display mode for a document. Three display modes are available. In the immediate mode, each modification made in the abstract tree of a document is immediately reflected in all opened views where the modification can be seen. In the deferred mode, the programmer can decide when the modifications are made visible to the user; this avoids the image of the document to blink when several elementary changes are made successively. Modifications are displayed when mode is changed to DisplayImmediately. In the NoComputedDisplay mode, the modifications are not displayed and they not computed inside the editor; the execution is more rapid but the current image is lost. When mode is changed to DisplayImmediately or DeferredMode, the image is completely redrawn by the editor. An application that handles several documents at the same time can choose different modes for different documents. When a document is open or created, it is initially in the immediate mode. Parameters: document: the document. NewDisplayMode: new display mode for that document. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetDisplayMode 
 public static native int TtaGetDisplayMode(int document)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetDisplayMode Returns the current display mode for a document. Parameter: document: the document. Return value: current display mode for that document. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaClearViewSelections 
 public static native void TtaClearViewSelections()
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaClearViewSelections unselects and clears all current displayed selections. ----------------------------------------------------------------------
